03008ca1283952ce.voiceContent: Splendid. I would certainly like to stay here for some time. I can just lay on my bed and enjoy my strategy books, far from the pressures of social interaction

046887b2bb0a9ad3.voiceContent: #Good morning, {NICKNAME}. I trust you slept well

0a864a60e4730ee4.voiceContent: I've just wrapped up the administrative affairs for today. Perhaps we can afford a moment to relax together

0cb46046ab8d5917.voiceContent: The world is full of troubles. But when compared with the vastness of the sea, all those troubles seem to just fade away

0e97a10d56615d51.voiceContent: There are all kinds of texts here, even my favorite periodicals. Does this mean... You read them, too

1116aa682c897a49.voiceContent: I mean... After years of studying the art of war, I can't help but consider all the strategic points upon arriving in a new place like this

2062c94a5ca32427.voiceContent: Among the piles of texts on governmental affairs and diplomacy, there were a few books on the art of war. They were like gems to me

217e1a8ad77a6939.voiceContent: ...With the exception of you, of course

219cca45728a6055.voiceContent: After residing here for a while, I've grown more accustomed to the scenery and my mind has gradually come to be at peace

2aa3a4faedd941a9.voiceContent: I did my best to carefully record each of their names, but after about twenty people or so, I had already lost track

2b43ef7ae237ff3b.voiceContent: Besides, you will have the grand strategist accompanying you

307be927a2473813.voiceContent: Sure, what would you like to talk about

31a5d5394cc9360d.voiceContent: I remember I used to always stay home all by myself when I was little. I didn't really have any friends... In fact, I seldom spoke to anyone

3f82d8e9e110502f.voiceContent: Mm... This is why I am so happy whenever I see you making progress

48dfc0252ca38603.voiceContent: Wait, I've come up with a clever solution

4a09ac36d725843d.voiceContent: There are times when I feel utterly exhausted, so I thought I should share with you the way that I unwind

55bc21925beb7e44.voiceContent: You need only focus on resting and I'll take care of the details

5f094e7b033ffabf.voiceContent: The distance between the bed and the kotatsu is exactly right, and the placement of the wardrobe is eminently sensible... I like this bedroom very much

62cfc6eebb91dcc2.voiceContent: Mm. I suppose I never expected that someone like me who was used to staying home would be promoted to such a position

6347106f34774388.voiceContent: Where would the enemy troops set up camp? From which direction could they mount an assault? And what strategies should we implement to counter these factors

729427516492931e.voiceContent: When I found myself bored with little to do, I would skim through the various books we had lying around the house

73bd5b630f1358c0.voiceContent: I remember thinking at the time that it would be perfect to work as an adviser someday. Whenever Her Excellency would come to me for advice, I could put on a show and mysteriously hand her a directive

75305e363c07b7bb.voiceContent: We need a barricade here... another sentry tower there... I began to instinctively consider all these things when I first arrived here

84bdee98e4d97dd7.voiceContent: Oh, but could I rent a room to use as a command post? I need a place to lay out my maps and battle scenarios

8af6fe4eeeed2e0e.voiceContent: Though the ages pass and time brings change, the sea continues as it always has. As I float down among the depths of the sea, a deep tranquility permeates my heart

8c20f260996f39b0.voiceContent: If the opportunity arises, I would like to take you diving with me

8cda471599c13fd0.voiceContent: I—I'd love to hear what you think about them

8fe744daa7d97d35.voiceContent: When that day comes, I can serve as your adviser. Wouldn't that be nice

934bac605c13f1f8.voiceContent: I'll finally have all the energy I need every day. Mm, just thinking about it makes me happy

9a1459cd46d34d3c.voiceContent: A journey is much like a battle, you cannot set out exhausted

9c5ac09317f722b8.voiceContent: My bedroom is my quiet space. Once I close the door, no one can disturb me..

9c731c15f6207e89.voiceContent: This way, we can journey together underwater! You'll feel refreshed before you know it

9fa8904db5bb36c4.voiceContent: If you ask me, I would say this is almost an ideal place. I can easily separate myself from the outside world and enjoy some time to myself..

a0d27c5f603d34e6.voiceContent: I felt a little like a fish out of water when I first arrived

a3f32bafa579b8fe.voiceContent: It'll be my turn to make breakfast tomorrow. You'll be able to sleep in

a4c4d84f4c67c916.voiceContent: But, you'll still be here, correct

a5ea7d83228700f2.voiceContent: No, not at all. The purpose of the trip is to relax, after all. Simply do as you please

ba5f76f2218cfc46.voiceContent: Perhaps one day, you'll be even more suited than myself to appear before people, and even better prepared to carry their hopes forward

bc17b8e53fd2088b.voiceContent: I clearly remember that on my first day as priestess, I had well over one hundred people come pay their respects to me

c627bb422e0feb7c.voiceContent: More about me? Mm... I don't mind. I only worry that you may find the topic a little boring

cccf35599325ccc1.voiceContent: Then, I could just snuggle right back up in my blanket and continue sleeping with no fear of anyone disrupting me

d4f88b046cab3d68.voiceContent: Eventually, I would feign that I was busy handling administrative affairs while using the papers to make a rough sketch of them with their name noted to the side for memorization later

de8b923fb86c396c.voiceContent: Mm... That is indeed a problem

e06dd306633e89ae.voiceContent: Wow... You kept this a secret, didn't you

eea4821cfe0ffbc8.voiceContent: Though I've never gone diving together with anyone before, I must say that I certainly look forward to it

efd6ec3e7c56b972.voiceContent: Mm... Yes, I eventually realized that I was overthinking things

f0048e2ea8bfbf3a.voiceContent: I'll wrap the two of us in a gigantic bubble... We can slowly sink down into the sea together

fd054da6298ca687.voiceContent: I'll be sure to wake you once breakfast is ready

0a17175f491cca4b.voiceContent: Initially, I was astonished to see anyone coming to Watatsumi Island wearing a Tenryou Commission uniform. A Tenryou Commission samurai would never be that brazen, and a Tenryou Commission spy would never be that conspicuous. Shortly after, I discovered that he was a self-proclaimed detective by the name of Shikanoin, and that he took no interest in military, government, or commercial affairs. Instead, he seemed to have arrived for a bit of sightseeing. As such, I set a few eyes on him, but refrained from taking any action to remove him from the island. Be sure to talk to him if the chance ever presents itself

0ac116ecc6759892.voiceContent: I simply love Watatsumi Sango Pearls... They're not just a source of income for Watatsumi Island, but a gift from the sea itself

0d605aec8e9fe823.voiceContent: Happy birthday! So, what are your plans for the day? Oh, why don't we celebrate on Watatsumi Island? First, I'll take you out at daybreak to see the sunrise, then we can go diving during the heat of the day. In the evening, we can go for a stroll around Sangonomiya Shrine. If it rains, we'll find somewhere cozy to hide out with a few strategy books, and try to bake a cake together! In any case, no need to plan anything, the grand strategist has everything thought out for you

0ebb8f66e312eeb7.voiceContent: I like to take my time and eat slowly, that way I can enjoy it for longer

0ff06efd60479276.voiceContent: I have also heard of Guuji Yae's great deeds. In all fairness, I hold her to be an outstanding shrine maiden, and she has performed her duties marvelously. I even heard that she holds responsibility where Yae Publishing House's light novels are concerned. An enigmatic individual to say the least..

133a93d4ea8d8af7.voiceContent: Ah... back when Beidou and I were carrying out ambushes against the Shogun's Army together, I raised my concerns that the enemy might detect our approach. But Beidou assured me of her fleet's unwavering discipline, and that raids could be carried out without detection. In the end, she was right, and that's exactly what happened. Now, every time the Watatsumi fleet encounters some sort of bottleneck, I consider inviting her to come and give them her instruction. There's no doubt, she runs a tight ship..

192b91f340a93f3c.voiceContent: Mm? Night already? Time seems to slip away when I'm with you

1f57512293884d51.voiceContent: Yummy, this is delicious! And it seems my energy is also... Ahem, I mean... Never mind..

23cc023477ba8f72.voiceContent: Mmmm... to improve efficiency, we must make some adjustments to our battle plan for the afternoon

2b4807fa143a76f4.voiceContent: Among Yae Publishing House's various publications, my personal favorite is the Teyvat Art of War. See, it has articles on classic military campaigns, as well as detailed analysis and commentary from famous strategists. There are a few that I particularly enjoy... Here, let me read them to you

2be325cf5eef2e3c.voiceContent: Oh, it seems we're at an impasse

409d85d6f4a77661.voiceContent: The situation is ever-changing in a card game. To emerge victorious, you have to be willing to take some risks

4303f865585abc72.voiceContent: After becoming the Divine Priestess, I gradually grew accustomed to this life. At the very least, I have the power to change something when it doesn't sit well with me. More importantly, this title allowed me to meet you, did it not

456464b8f3b5d3cc.voiceContent: I often used to succumb to self-doubt. I would think to myself, Can a person like me really hold the title of Divine Priestess? Now, the thought hardly crosses my mind. When I'm with you, I seem to be able to cut straight through most problems

468e50ca9e37d1ee.voiceContent: I'm just bubbling with energy... We'll make a formidable force in our next fight

49e0ce896c6bd543.voiceContent: In my book, Visions are symbols of aspiration, and aspiration is a precious thing indeed. This is exactly why the resistance was formed — to oppose the Vision Hunt Decree. Aspiration should never be abandoned or forcibly taken away

4a89cdfd77d2c4b5.voiceContent: I just love eating Bird Egg Sushi. The ingredients are easy to find, and it's simple to prepare... Ah... perfect for military life. Sitting down to eat Bird Egg Sushi in the midst of war might seem a bit extravagant, but in most cases, simple food like this brings great satisfaction to the soldiers

503e3a28c2e49232.voiceContent: Yummy, this is delicious! And it seems my energy is also... Ahem, I mean... Never mind..

590f0e9626ac9564.voiceContent: It's said that the depths of a person's heart run deep indeed. Yet, as the Divine Priestess of Watatsumi Island, it is my duty to strive to understand each person's thoughts. Let's start with you, Traveler. What are you thinking about now? Let me take a guess..

6112718595bb7ed8.voiceContent: Hmm... I'll need to review and reflect on this match

6443b68f088d7d49.voiceContent: Legend has it that our ancestors lived in a palace in the depths of the ocean, and that the god, Orobashi, brought us to the surface. I've often wondered, wouldn't a palace like that be too dark? Every time I think about it, I start to really appreciate the light..

6bf663095dc31eb0.voiceContent: All is accounted for, let's move out

6cb9486d27f07654.voiceContent: Good night. Garner your strength for the battles ahead

6fb6a6ef2910d4ab.voiceContent: Gorou is an exceptional general... sincere, determined, and courageous. He has a strong camaraderie with the troops and is able to come up with creative battle plans. He does, however, have one shortcoming... He often lets the excitement of battle get to his head. If you are ever deployed to the battlefield together, be sure to have a good rein on him when things get underway

75f19d7488f27ff6.voiceContent: Sure. I just came up with a new strategy. This will be the perfect chance to test it out

781d1ed1943c1a91.voiceContent: Brute force is not my modus operandi. But becoming stronger isn't a bad thing

7c25501311745152.voiceContent: Yae Publishing House has released numerous works that lay out military strategy in a simple and pragmatic way. Those are my favorite

7d4e7424bbf4fb24.voiceContent: To survive hardship, you must prepare for hardship

7fea21bc42b1702d.voiceContent: Mmm... I must admit, Kujou Sara is an opponent that cannot be taken lightly. She seldom employs cunning strategy, but her performance in open warfare is always admirable. The Shogun's Army places great trust in her abilities — they are united and ready to fight valiantly under her command, even to the death. Her forces have been a serious threat to the resistance on multiple occasions

80ebd0701f2523ba.voiceContent: It appears that victory is mine this time

8823697aaa30d6db.voiceContent: The battlefield is unpredictable — one false move could mark utter defeat. Before the onset of battle, I bring every possible scenario into consideration, and turn my thoughts into written directives. These are then issued to the troops. ...It does seem at present like they're somewhat over-reliant on the directives, which worries me... If they read up on military strategy themselves, they could begin to rely on their own ability to read the battlefield. I need them to be able to identify and seize opportunities in the heat of the moment

8e7fda84d48c2fd8.voiceContent: I like to take my time and eat slowly, that way I can enjoy it for longer

8fcbb4647d6fab23.voiceContent: We should make the most of these supplies

9078bc54837bab24.voiceContent: Marching in the rain conceals the sound of our arrival, but is also a test of stamina..

98853cf87fd879f6.voiceContent: Good morning. I've just read a fascinating stratagem, would you like to study it together

9b374fe2e6c7436d.voiceContent: My strategies and my deck are at the ready. Let us begin

9cd5df6e41b67829.voiceContent: My mother once taught me that it takes a broad outlook to become a qualified leader. However, my younger years were mostly spent traveling between Sangonomiya and the army. I never had time to embark on my own adventure. So... there are many aspects of adventuring that I've yet to fully understand. Mm, you'll have to excuse my lack of experience in this area

9d8730a74965ea0e.voiceContent: Now that the Vision Hunt Decree is over, Watatsumi Island has once again returned to normal life. It has never been my intent to scrutinize the rights and wrongs of the Shogun's actions, even to this day. What I do care about is the future of our island. It is my hope that the Shogun will fulfill her promise and that we can live with the Shogunate in peace. However, if there comes a day when she once again casts aside the aspirations of the people, I can assure you that we won't sit by and watch

9e4d927144c274fd.voiceContent: Oh, it seems we're at an impasse

9f9d195ffbe9a436.voiceContent: I must be more cautious next time..

aae3127d47f33202.voiceContent: Mm... High winds. An incendiary attack would be particularly effective

ac36b8afde6c055e.voiceContent: Huh? What do I enjoy? Simple. I like to find a quiet place by myself and read books on strategy... Ahh, the whole day, without interruption. I'd be even happier if we looked over some of it together. One thing though... You'd have to sleep on the floor

b024588745366e45.voiceContent: Mm... I hope we can put an end to this battle quickly. The Yae Publishing House has just released a new volume of A Legend of Sword. Ah, I'd like nothing more than to curl up with a copy in my room and read it front to back

b6741c96107b4688.voiceContent: After you left, the soldiers of Swordfish II nominated a temporary captain, but everyone was hoping that you'd return. I could only tell them that you'd been tasked with an important solo mission. If you get the chance, you should go visit them, I'm sure they'd love to see you

b9c857db87faaeb7.voiceContent: To be quite honest, I'm not particularly skilled at communicating with others. Putting on my Divine Priestess airs certainly makes things easier, but once I run out of energy, I start to get a bit negative. I prevent others from seeing that side of me at all costs. The people of Watatsumi Island need a perfect leader, not some girl who likes to wile away her time at home

bd278500e2841875.voiceContent: Kazuha once came and bunked with the resistance for a time. If I'm not mistaken, he got along very well with Gorou — they would often fight side-by-side in battle. Kazuha has a carefree personality and doesn't like constraints, but he would follow every command to the letter when he was among our ranks. In my opinion, not only is he an outstanding swordsman, but a very refined character

c85d6a5d180bbabb.voiceContent: A long time ago, I had no intention of becoming the Divine Priestess. My only goal was to study military strategy and become an adviser. That way, I could remain behind the scenes and lessen my overall burden. *sigh* Fate had other ideas in store... You can't defy that which flows in your veins

cbb1b2c25dbb25f7.voiceContent: The moon shines bright over the depths of the seas as the tides come and go. It seems that as I go from strength to strength, so does my state of mind flow

d62203b1fd9389dc.voiceContent: I am Sangonomiya Kokomi, the Divine Priestess of Watatsumi Island. My journey with you will be an opportunity to unwind... Ahem, I mean... to survey beyond our borders. Don't worry, I've left behind ample directives in my absence, and have also completed the island's projected development plans. Departing for a brief period will be of little consequence

d82495e161f9bb6b.voiceContent: The world below water is not bright and sunny like that of dry land. Still, whenever I lend myself to the deep, my heart gradually fills with a permeating sense of peace. Fish move in faraway shoals, jellyfish dance around me, and my troubles start to simply wash away. Mmm... I could take you to see it sometime, what do you think

d9c0b8c6f2fdd99b.voiceContent: The snow... have you ever seen such beauty

e0b194cc31b0e4d2.voiceContent: Goodbye. I'll stay and play a few more rounds. I want to try some different card combinations..

e233026b858c8eda.voiceContent: Mm... So this is the thrill of adventure..

e2cfcb7d525b9c59.voiceContent: My preparations were not in vain

ed108982940a2d97.voiceContent: Mm... If I had to say, I'm not fond of any sort of seafood. But please, keep this strictly confidential. The fishing industry is essential to Watatsumi Island, and if word were to get out that seafood wasn't my thing, I'm afraid morale would be gravely affected

eecbe3d3b0464df3.voiceContent: That match was quite the conundrum..

f119bd011d466531.voiceContent: Take heart, victory will be ours

f3ff88863c4137e6.voiceContent: No matter how pressing the situation may become, I must remain composed. If I let the stress get to me, then what can I expect from others around me

ff42ae1c78c424b5.voiceContent: Respect must be given to the will of every creature. Each fish in the ocean swims in its own direction

ffb1fb63ef133d76.voiceContent: Such fortunate weather... Care for a walk
